subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Talladega Superspeedway
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Pleas from many drivers on the Nascar circuit for safety improvements had been ignored for years until Busch’s accident, which prompted officials at many tracks to add more protection.
snippet: Pleas from many drivers on the Nascar circuit for safety improvements had been ignored for years until Busch’s accident, which prompted officials at many tracks to add more protection.
